channel.title: How do you mute a player on the fr33sc4p3 source?
channel.description:
hello all, could someone send me the code to mute a player for like 48 hours or something like that, because im on the fr33sc4p3 source but It wont work, could someone give me the code to add in?
Many Thanks James.

item.title: How do you mute a player on the fr33sc4p3 source?
item.dc:creator: @Threatening Threatening
item.description:
@Threatening wrote:

hmm…im pretty sure its ::muteuser (name) or ::mute (name) or if your a admin… just do ::checkip ::ipban(ip)

Read full topic
item.source: How do you mute a player on the fr33sc4p3 source?
